# [[w:Guan Chun|Guan Chun]] (a [[character]] in the [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]])

===Usage notes===
* This person actually existed, but his real name was Min Chun ([[閔純]]). In [[w:Romance of the Three Kingdoms|Romance of the Three Kingdoms]], the name Min Chun was changed to Guan Chun.
